hilo-keaukaha.name: Hilo - Keaukaha
hilo-keaukaha.details: Buses between downtown Hilo and Keaukaha by way of Aupuni Center, Hilo shopping center, UH, Hawai'i Community College and Prince Kuhio plaza

kona.name: Intra Kona
kona.details: Buses travel from Kailua-Kona, (with service to Palani Road), out to Capt. Cook.

kohala-resort.details: Operates from Kapaau to South Kohala

waimea.name: Waimea Shuttle
waimea.details: Waimea shuttle buses between Lakeland and Kamuela view estates by way of Hawaiian Homes/Kuhio Viillage, Parker Ranch shopping center, HPA lower campus and Waimea park.

waikoloa.name: Waikoloa Village Shuttle
waikoloa.details: Waikoloa Village Shuttle operates Monday - Saturday, 6:30 a.m. - 5:10 p.m., by Polynesian Adventure Tours
